title: change background color failed after adding Fall Puppy Theme
content:
I'm running 91.4.0esr. I like the "Fall Puppy" theme, but it turned the background black. Changing the background color to white does not correct the problem. (tools=>settings=>General=>fonts&colors=>colors) I don't want to disable the theme. In the past I think I could edit the preference file to override the theme background color. I there away to edit the "Fall Puppy" background default? 

Guidance Please.
creator: wildrice

title: Spotify keep showing premium page
content: I used to use Spotify web player to listen music,but I can not do it anymore yesterday. And it keeps showing the premium page that ask me to pay for it,even I click refresh or review 2021 best songs,it won't work properly. And I use Edge to try it again,then Edge works fine,by the way,I already clear cache and cookies,also restart Firefox multiple times,and even try the private mode and remove all my add-ons,still not working. Any idea would be great,Best regards.
creator: 901009easonchen

title: paswords
content:
Hi Why does it tell me "unlock firefox" on the Twitter application when filling out the password? Until now, it automatically filled in passwords, but now it constantly reports "unlock firefox". It happened once, but it was one day, so everything was fine again. Now it constantly reports for each application. 

Thanks in advance!

Ikiss@sbb.rs Postovani Zasto mi kod popunjavanja pasworda recimo na aplikaciji Twitera javlja "otkljucaj firefox"? Do sada je sam automatski popunjavao pasworde ali sad javlja stalno "otkljucaj firefox". Jednom se to desilo ali je to bio jedan dan, pa je ponovo bilo sve u redu. Sada stalno to javlja za svaku aplikaciju. Unapred hvala Ikiss@sbb.rs
creator: ikiss
